title: The considerations of Drexelius upon eternitie translated by Ralph Winterton ...
author: Drexel, Jeremias, 1581-1638.
publisher: Printed by the printers to the Vniversitie,
notes: Translation of "De aeternitate considerationes".--Cf. NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Added engraved t.p. with imprint: Cambridge : Printed by Tho. Buck, & Roger Daniel, [and] are to be sould by Nic. Alsop at the Angel in Popes-head alley, 1636.
Imperfect: tightly bound with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
